description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A futuristic sports game involving Artificially Intelligent RoboBots based around an evolved version of Soccer with a plasma ball. Each team attempts to score the highest number of points in order to progress through the AirPlay Tournament. Select from 14 RoboBot characters and 7 force field surrounded scenes.
